job title: Research Data Analyst,school of Dental Medicine,
job description:
Desired: STATAQualtricsRSASProvide data analysis and advanced statistical programming. Collaborate with co-investigators on manuscripts, presentations and constructing statistical plans. Work on study design and procedures with Project P.I. Create data entry instruments, train and supervise users. Collect, organize and analyze data.

Required Skills:
Statistical, analytical and programming experience necessary. Knowledge of SAS, R or STATA software a must. Experience with Qualtrics, Redcap, Complex data structures and management preferred.

BA degree required.
